sentence: The pool scene was busy on the weekend but you can escape to a quieter area if you like
All in all some of my experiences left me frustrated and I probably would not go to this hotel again for that reason
I guess I am past the club scene
If you are looking for a GHETTO party scene then this is your place
The pools and grounds were fine but that does not justify the overall experience
He also kept us from having bad experiences by keeping us away from problem areas and establishments
There are shops and amenities on the grounds but more than these things the ambiance at the hotel is what we savor

Also I do not typically like to stay at such large resorts as these for many of the reasons I outlined above music club like atmosphere etc so take my opinion with a grain of salt if that is your thing
This place has a better vibe the public spaces have more charm and character and the layout is more conducive to a resort feel
I tend to spend most of my days at the pool beach so it is important to me how the environment there makes me feel
it is very elegant sophisticated and pretty hotel and the best one for Saturdays night party
Overall our family had a great experience
I am a fan of this hotel and have never had anything but a good experience in Puerto Rico
The room assigned looked nice and modern but the style clashed with the very lavish experience from the main floor lobby

After a Year and a Half of renovations accommodations from the Grand Lobby old world charm to the pool and beach area wonderful beach vibe and the rooms large very nice and comfortable make this a super place to enjoy San Juan
The hotel has a great Latin vibe in the lobby but also has a real cool club that plays the newest j music for upscale clubbing
He definitely brought a pleasant experience to the start of each day and added a lot of value to my stay
I would recommend this hotel to everyone that wants a beautiful experience
Definitely catering to a young pool scene
We loved the vibe immediately on entering and the late night scene was always fun
